pe6:18.2: acchadanaṃ → avacchanaṃ (bj) | avacchadanaṃ (pts1) | avecchadanaṃ (mr), apasacchāgamanaṃ → apasaṭṭhāgamanaṃ (bj)
pe6:53.5: āsappanā → appanā (pts1, mr), adhiṭṭhāgamanaṃ → anadiṭṭhānaṃ (bj) | aniṭṭhāgamanaṃ (mr)
pe6:60.2: sammadaññāvimutto →  katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho (sī1), sampajañño vimutto (pā1, ka-ma)
pe6:74.2: gatapaṭṭho → vigataṭṭho (bj) | appaṭṭho (pts1), vivaṭṭaṭṭho → vivattaṭṭho suññaṭṭho (bj)
